text:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=806319&view=rev

resultLength == 0 means the deflater which is trying to read the embedded ICC profile needs more input. However, there is not extra input available!

Decided to terminate the loop. Since this will result in an invalid ICC profile, it is ignored, and the image will be loaded without the profile. Testcase is added.

Max
